4px,inset rgba(0,0,0,.25) 0 -1px 0 7px,inset hsla(0,0%,100%,.7) 0 2px 1px 7px,rgba(0,0,0,.15) 0 -5px 6px 4px,rgba(43,42,42,.5) 0 5px 6px 4px;position:fixed;top:45%;margin-left:-100px;margin-top:-100px}header #speaker2{left:70%}header #cone{background:-webkit-radial-gradient(center,ellipse cover,#494949 0,#2b2b2b 100%);box-shadow:0 0 20px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.8),0 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.7);width:50px;height:50px;border-radius:100%;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;margin-left:-25px;margin-top:-25px}@-webkit-keyframes speakeasy{0%{-webkit-transform:scale(1)}20%{-webkit-transform:scale(1.075)}to{-webkit-transform:scale(1)}}
